name: Eat Grow Live
description:
This game built for the Jam in Ludum Dare 46, originally we aimed for the compo but the time difference really killed us, unfortunately gotta sleep some time.

Inspired by the likes of insaniquarium this is about keeping a little alien alive by feeding it and protecting it from predators helping it to evolve. It's meant to be steady, calm(ish) and soothing rather than heavy action.

Click the food button to play, gems to pick them up and spam click enemies to kill them at the cost of precious resources.
